title: JULIA2023
author: JULIA2023
content: Good Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your reply

comments.author: Don Pedro Dinero
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.What you have to do is read it, then.Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMfrom where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeReading it. Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyYou already have the first step: read the forum.

comments.author: crwth
comments.body: What are you talking about with the 9 steps? What does that mean? Start your journey by reading. You could start the following ton the below linksNewbies - Read before posting[General] How to earn Bitcoins[General] Bitcoin Wallets - Which, what, why?

comments.author: EL MOHA
comments.body: Welcome to the forum mate, i don’t get your point from the subject of this thread but if you meant that the more you grow the easier it is I would say yes. The forum is guided with rules, you can read the links above. I will like to add the Beginners and Help Encyclopedia, it encompasses almost all the useful topics on the forum you can go through them gradually. Secondly this a forum where you can ask just any questions related to bitcoin and cryptocurrency at large but since the forum is almost a decade old most of this questions might have been discussed before so the right way is to use the search function first before proceeding to create any thread about your question. Here is how to effectively use the search function, this way you don’t get to spam the forum with repeated threads

comments.author: terrific
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy You have already made your first step of using it as you're able to post and made a thread.Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMand i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyGo and read the respective sections that you can see as there's a lot of sets of topics that you can read. Lastly, read the forum rules:Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ

comments.author: un_rank
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum...Your first step is to read the forum rules and avoid violating any of them. Then read all other links in this necessary thread for newbies - https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1689727.0.From here you should have a good understanding of the rules and how the forum layout works, then you can start reading and interacting. The forum is made up of users, and we share knowledge here which is the primary goal of the forum. The more you read the more you learn.- Jay -

comments.author: JULIA2023
comments.body: Go and read the respective sections that you can see as there's a lot of sets of topics that you can read. Lastly, read the forum rules:Unofficial list of (official) Bitcointalk.org rules, guidelines, FAQ[/quote]A link you provided is all in one i read the the 33 rules of the forum which i will remember or again reading before posting the thread or replying.also guidlines for the the thread is available in this link which is plus point for me to post a thread by help of these guidlines.

comments.author: terrific
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 06:33:53 AMA link you provided is all in one i read the the 33 rules of the forum which i will remember or again reading before posting the thread or replying.also guidlines for the the thread is available in this link which is plus point for me to post a thread by help of these guidlines.Yes, that's what most newbies have to go through to know what are the rules of the forum.It will serve as your guide so that you know what you must avoid and hopefully you will never have to break one of it.Good luck to you as you go through the forum and everyone will help you through your surfing here.

comments.author: Fuso.hp
comments.body: The first step to learning about a new subject is very difficult. For those who struggle through the difficult steps, the next steps are definitely easier. When you are new to bitcoin talk forums, it is natural that everything seems difficult for you. If you find everything difficult and get frustrated, you will drop out of this forum. So you try to take things easy without finding everything so difficult, first you try to skip the topics which you find difficult in this forum, you keep doing those which are easy, no one will force you to learn the difficult topics.  First start with easy topics and slowly when you try to learn about difficult topics, things will be much easier for you so there is no need to be disappointed beforehand. Links of some important posts have been shared in the previous comments. Please enter those links and try to read those pin posts well. I hope you will find the difficult topics easy.

comments.author: Tuturtinular
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyBitcointalk is a discussion forum, if you like discussing then it's easy. You just need to join the threads you are interested in and share your opinions and ideas regarding the issues being discussed.However, if you have other goals such as increasing rankings, participating in signature campaigns, and earning bitcoins on forums, of course you need to read a lot of forum rules. But all of this can be achieved if we discuss it. So basically this is a discussion forum so get discussing

comments.author: Tiger420
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyI am writing you a step by step list of 9 important rules.1. I'm new to Bitcoin, what should I do?2. BitcoinTalk forum's new user Question &Answer Episode3. Become a good poster!4. Concept of Merit5. Proper use of trust system6. Ways to earn through service boards7. BitcoinTalk Forum Rules8. Bitcoin Wallets - Which, What, Why?9. Newbies - Read before posting

comments.author: examplens
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.If I may ask, what exactly do you expect from this forum? It would help a lot to get more precise comments and information, although there is already enough information in the previous comments.btw. Registering on the forum is the first step, reading topics that interest you is the second step, and opening a new topic (which is exactly this) is the third step.The Bitcointalk forum is not a place in the universe, and you don't need to be a scientist to participate here. Just a discussion platform, which is basically about everything related to Bitcoin. Just look around and join the discussion that interests you or what you want to know more about.

comments.author: Free Market Capitalist
comments.body: Quote from: examplens on October 14, 2023, 09:36:45 AMIf I may ask, what exactly do you expect from this forum? That everything is served to him on a platter. That we explain to him step by step, how to succeed in this forum, where oddly enough, money is made. I don't remember seeing people asking questions like this in the various other forums I have been to and still visit from time to time. Instead in this section we have every now and then threads like this one. Quote from: examplens on October 14, 2023, 09:36:45 AMJust look around and join the discussion that interests you or what you want to know more about. In other words, if you want to learn to swim without getting wet, you're in trouble. I would understand more if in this section newbies would ask questions after doing some digging. Like simple questions about block mining or the 21 million cap, things like that, but questions like "what is this forum about", "tell me what I have to do to succeed in this forum" and the like I think are tolerated in a very benevolent way with newbies that in other parts of the forum would be deleted for low value.

comments.author: Taskford
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyDon't expect there's easy step for us to know more about this forum since there are so many technical topics that needed to research before we participate in a discussion so that we will not create any trouble just for the wrong info or idea that we share to the public.You are already here so maybe start with the pinned threads of this forum since those are helpful threads where you can learn a lot about this forum. Also all post are authentic its just you need to get those idea coming from different people so that you can learn on bigger scale. It doesn't mean they show some great ideas here you will follow them but rather take those other opinion and make all of it as a basis so that you became more better forum member and have more knowledge about crypto. Beginners help will be the best section regarding on newbie discussions but for other altcoin go to altcoin section so familiarized the forum and each section so you can go directly on the board if you are searching for some information's.

comments.author: Baofeng
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyYou are already here isn't it, so you already made the first step.Others have pointed out and give you the links that you need to read and understand. Just remember that this is a community, and just like any other real life community, you need to observed rules and regulations and follow then.And after that, you can go browse the forum, learn as much as you can and if you have doubts then you can ask questions.

comments.author: Gallar
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyPersonally, I think you've already started the first step. Because joining this forum is your first step. Then the next step, you just need to read the regulations that apply to this forum. Once you read the rules on this forum, I'm sure the next steps you take will be easier. Because more or less you will understand more about this BTT forum. Then, once you understand all the rules in this forum, all you have to do is decide which board you want to study on. Do you have an interest in investing in bitcoin, or do you have an interest in trading altcoins, or do you want to explore other things available on this forum (discuss). So in essence, your steps after reading the rules in this forum will indeed be easier.And for more details, you can read the thread below. Happy reading friends.• Forum moderation policy• Newbies - Read before posting

comments.author: Majestic-milf
comments.body: It looks like this is another brand of "new here, need a guide" most newbies use but I'd have to hand it to this user for having to make this a clickbait. Who ever said the first step on this forum is reading? What happens to being registered? Well, let's agree that reading's the first, what then are the remaining 8, op.   Welcome to the forum. Do well to abide by the rules and regulations supplied for you by others ( that's if you'd read it though) so you don't flout them and risk having your account banned and then having to create another so you can repeat this question again..

comments.author: Woodie
comments.body: To be honest, to know the forum takes one to live and experience it...I know you want to go through this by not making mistakes but less face it, just like any other forum the basics will always to know the rules to avoid being in the wrong books of it and then from there livr and after several months of the forum you will be okay.Otherwise the pinned threads are a must read to get yourself acquainted with the forum, good luck .

comments.author: SatoPrincess
comments.body: Quote from: JULIA2023 on October 14, 2023, 05:17:01 AMGood Morning every one. I want to know about this forum.from where i can start and how can i get first step to use this forum while i have not use this beforeonly help me to take first step after that all step will be easy and i want to know more and more about this forum only athentic answer should be in your replyYou’re already posting so it’s obvious you’re already using the forum. A little more effort on your end is what you need, other members have been generous enough to provide you links that will help you get acquainted to the forum. I hope you read the threads given to you especially the forum rules, and you apply all you learn as you grow to become a good member of bitcointalk.

comments.author: EFS
comments.body: First step, you found this forum.Second step, you decided to sign-up.Third step, you opened your first thread.There is no hard part. This is a Bitcoin forum, you found here so that means you are interested in Bitcoin. Just be a casual forum member, read, learn and write about what you like. It's not different than other forums.
